s = input()
t = input()

s = list(s)
t = list(t)

sDict = {}
tDict = {}

for i in range(len(s)):
    sDict[s[i]] = s.count(s[i])
    tDict[t[i]] = t.count(t[i])

if sDict == tDict:
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")



def can_make_equal(S, T):
    if len(S) != len(T):
        return False
    if sorted(S) != sorted(T):
        return False
    return True


if __name__ == "__main__":
    S = input()
    T = input()
    print("Yes" if can_make_equal(S, T) else "No")

def can_make_equal(S, T):
    if len(S) != len(T):
        return False
    if sorted(S) != sorted(T):
        return False
    return True

if __name__ == "__main__":
    S = input()
    T = input()

s = input()
t = input()

sDict = {}
tDict = {}

for i in range(len(s)):
    if s[i] not in sDict:
        sDict[s[i]] = 1
    else:
        sDict[s[i]] += 1

    if t[i] not in tDict:
        tDict[t[i]] = 1
    else:
        tDict[t[i]] += 1

if sDict == tDict:
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")

def can_make_equal(S, T):
    if len(S) != len(T):
        return False
    if sorted(S) != sorted(T):
        return False

    return True

if __name__ == "__main__":
    S = input()
    T = input()
    print("Yes" if can_make_equal(S, T) else "No")
